original_text:
by your great wisdom in your trade
    you have increased your wealth,
    and your heart has become proud in your wealth—
korean_text: 네 큰 지혜와 네 무역으로 재물을 더하고 그 재물로 말미암아 네 마음이 교만하였도다

sentences.original_text: by your great wisdom in your trade
and your heart has become proud in your wealth—
sentences.korean_translation: 네 마음이 네 재물로 인해 교만해졌다
